description: Adds the specified resources to the specified group. To run this command, you must have the following permissions:

parameters.name: Group
parameters.description: The name or the Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource group to add resources to.

parameters.name: ResourceArns
parameters.description: The list of Amazon resource names (ARNs) of the resources to be added to the group. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Succeeded
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon resource names (ARNs) of the resources that this operation successfully added to the group.

nested_items.name: Failed
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon resource names (ARNs) of any resources that this operation failed to add to the group.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource that failed to be added or removed.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message text associated with the failure.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the failure.

nested_items.name: Pending
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon resource names (ARNs) of any resources that this operation is still in the process adding to the group. These pending additions continue asynchronously. You can check the status of pending additions by using the ListGroupResources operation, and checking the Resources array in the response and the Status field of each object in that array.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource that's in a pending state.
